tags: well damn...i was in the front row and had a brilliant seat and coukd have had such a great video of this whole panel!
but for inexplicable reasons i thought i'd both video record on my camera and take photos on my phone
which lead to both things being a disaster 🤦‍♀️
not sure qhy i lose all commin sense when it comes to dt
so yeag crappy video and crappy pictures
and as if that wasn't bad enough the main reason i didn't upload everything as soon as i got home was
that i couldn't be bothered to create the moving picture version of the photos
and figured it could wait to the next day 🤦‍♀️
hence ending up losing yhe stupid pictures anyway and losing a precious secret video 😭😭😭
i hate myself just a little bit *deep sigh*
coukd have had such a good video of the panel and my precious video of dt saying my name twice 😭😭😭
anyway....posting this mainly for my own sake 😂 it's like my lityle diary...since i can't pull myself to write anything otherwise
i have loke 1200 screenshots from the video...imagine how many that could have been had i actually done thr video properly 🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️🤦‍♀️
(omg i'm terrible at typing on phones....or autocorrect just sucks a lot 😂)

blog.name: talktoten
blog.title: The Doctor
blog.description:
| independent tenth doctor |
open to non-mutuals
roleplay & advice
rules / about

summary: What advice would you offer to someone who is newly immortal and does not want to be?
question: What advice would you offer to someone who is newly immortal and does not want to be?
answer:
come send me asks or a meme or give the doctor tea, I am tired and stressed | accepting

“I wouldn’t.” What sort of rubbish man would he be, if he loaded advice on somebody at a time like that? Immortality wasn’t something to be taken lightly. It wasn’t even the sort of thing that, ethically, most of the immortal community thought ought to be available to those who weren’t born that way; at the very least, not available permanently to anyone under the age of 400. Age of consent thing, you just can’t know what immortality is without living it. So to have someone who was not immortal - who was presumably human - thrust into that sort of thing? The Doctor wasn’t going to open his mouth and start going on about everything they’d just lost. Jack Harkness had been thrust into immortality and the Doctor had literally run in the other direction, the whole topic sort of weirded him out. 

“Apologise, maybe, but there’s not really advice for it. That’s awful. Find who did it and see if you can sue.”

come send me asks or a meme or give the doctor tea, I am tired and stressed | accepting

summary:
If birds sing without worrying about who is listening to them, and 
monkeys dance without worrying about who is watching them,...
caption: If birds sing without worrying about who is listening to them, and monkeys dance without worrying about who is watching them, and hyenas laugh without worrying about who is mocking them, then you too must do what you do best without worry.-Matshona Dhliwayo
